titles.title: Rethinking Indian monsoon rainfall prediction in the context of recent global warming

custom_metadata.assertion: A correction has been published and is appended to both the HTML and PDF versions of this paper. The error has not been fixed in the paper.
The authors declare no competing financial interests.
